reviews.review_msg: BUS 338 with Professor Somani was one of the most enriching classes I have taken at SFU. He was extremely accessible for feedback and created a welcoming environment for us to learn. I gained real-world experience preparing work for a start-up that will undoubtedly help me in my career. I recommend this class to anyone, even non-business students!

I thoroughly enjoyed being a student in Amyn's BUS 338 class. Amyn understands his students well and sets appropriate expectations for assignments. The course also offers a unique opportunity to work with real start-ups, allowing students to gain valuable, hands-on experience. I highly recommend both Amyn and BUS 338!

It was a pleasure being taught by Amyn as he ensured that students were guided throughout the semester. The content taught in class were also applicable into real life scenarios. Overall, I would love to take this class again as we had the opportunity to work with actual startups where we applied with what we learned in class to help the startup.

BUS 338 was such a valuable experience! Working on a real client project for a startup gave me practical insights into market research and teamwork. The course was engaging, and the instructor's (Amyn) and TA's feedback really helped me. Highly recommend it to anyone interested in hands-on learning and improving business skills!
